"Perfect Strike":
"Perfect Strike guarantees a critical hit and inflicts
heavy damage.
The enemy is also greatly staggered by the attack."

"Perfect Strike
Perfect Strike is triggered when you press the
attack button just as the red glowing ring
around your character disappears after attacking."

"You can also use Perfect Strike in combination
with photon moves or charged photon magic."

ジャストアタックとなります。"

"フォトンアーツやチャージテクニックなどと
